name: Dance-Punk
description: Mixes the energy of Punk Rock with the danceable rhythms of Funk and Disco.

children.name: Dance-Punk Revival
children.description: Punchy and danceable variant of Post-Punk Revival that features Electronic instrumentation and influence from Alternative Dance.
